attributes.action: scrap financial requirement for partners visa
attributes.additional_details: the financial requirement for partners visa (£18600) should be scraped. this is devastating the lifes of many families including innocent children.  united by love divided by terassa may.our partners are not criminals or assylum seakers. where r our human rights? y should v b treated different to the EU nationals ? y this discrimination ? £18600 p/year is way too high for a working class person to earn. plz sign this petition so v can oppose this n help all to reunite with their loved onces.  many thanks
